metadata.title: CVE-2021-21311 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Adminer is an open-source database management in a single PHP file. In adminer from version 4.0.0 and before 4.7.9 there is a server-side request forgery vulnerability. Users of Adminer versions bundling all drivers (e.g. `adminer.php`) are affected. This is fixed in version 4.7.9.

criterions.comment: adminer package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.9-1').
